name: Cooper (davidmadethis)
description:
Cooper is an action RPG set in a time when corruption is overtaking the land. Adventure solo or team up with a friend to fight back against evil.

Controls:

I - inventory

O - abilities

L - quest log

Esc - menu (you will see some dev testing options here too)

Note:

- Can also be played using a gamepad

- Other players (split screen - couch coop) can be added to the game via an activate fire place (should make more sense you're in the game). 

This game has been in development for some time as an Indie Dev project and I'm seeking feedback on the overall game and whether to continue.

Enjoy!

David
